ValidationRule.description: Ship To County and Project Market Fields are Required to Close for Inquiry Type of Product and Market Alert.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( INCLUDES( Ship_To_Country__c , ""), INCLUDES( Project_Market__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Closed"), OR( ISPICKVAL( Type , "Product Availability"), ISPICKVAL( Type , "Product Specification"), ISPICKVAL( Type , "Market Alert") ), OR( RecordType.Name = "EDI Order", RecordType.Name = "Inquiry", RecordType.Name = "Inquiry (Internal)", RecordType.Name = "Order Claim", RecordType.Name = "Orders", RecordType.Name = "Quality Claim", RecordType.Name = "Third Party", RecordType.Name = "Changes" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ship To Country and Project Market fields are required to Close this ticket.
